Account.Title: Choose your account type...
Account.PatientDesc: allows you to save and view all your diabetes data. You can share this data with your family members or doctors who have a Patient or Medical Professional account.
Account.ReferentDesc: allows you to follow a relative who has a Patient account. You will have access to their diabetes data and will be alerted in case of abnormal measurements.
Account.MedicalProDesc: allows you to track all your patients with a Patient account. You will have access to their diabetes data and be alerted in case of abnormal measurements.

Confirm.Desc: Your registration has been successfully completed. An email will be sent to you shortly with a link to verify your account. If you have not received this email after a few minutes, please check your spam folder.
